channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 英国严重欺诈办公室的律师说，交易员因操纵 Libor 利率而被定罪是安全的，不应该被推翻。
item.description:
The convictions of traders over Libor interest rate rigging are safe and shouldn’t be overturned, lawyers for the UK Serious Fraud office say https://t.co/liWDWRm68A

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 秘鲁正努力摆脱去年的经济衰退，1 月份的经济复苏弱于预期
item.description:
Peru’s recovery was weaker than expected in January as the nation struggles to emerge from last year’s recession https://t.co/9sjRQj09V8

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 乌克兰无人机正在攻击俄罗斯石油工业的核心地带
item.description:
Ukrainian drones are striking at the very heart of Russia's oil industry https://t.co/H1YvxOqDuG

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 塞尔维亚央行行长表示，她将致力于提高巴尔干国家的信用评级并吸引新投资的涌入
item.description:
Serbia’s central bank chief said she’s committed to a campaign to boost the Balkan nation’s credit rating and attract an influx of fresh investment https://t.co/ka527joUbC

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 在一些成员国发出呼吁，希望进一步向克里姆林宫施压后，欧盟行政部门正在准备一项提案，限制从俄罗斯向欧盟进口农产品
item.description:
The EU executive is preparing a proposal to restrict the import of agricultural products from Russia to the bloc following appeals from some member states that want to put further pressure on the Kremlin https://t.co/NEEMR6Rs6G

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: Rivian 50 亿美元的电动车工厂可能会成为头条新闻，但不同类型的制造业繁荣才是美国工业增长的真实写照。
item.description:
Rivian's $5 billion EV plant may grab the headlines, but a different type of manufacturing boom tells the real story about US industrial growth. https://t.co/6YLm58YqL4

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 七国集团警告伊朗不要为乌克兰战争向俄罗斯提供弹道导弹
item.description:
G-7 nations warned Iran against providing ballistic missiles to Russia for the war in Ukraine https://t.co/pBo6jH7J1R

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 宝马在中国年度车展上被点名，消费者投诉其技术问题和低劣服务
item.description:
BMW was named at an annual show in China airing consumer complaints about technical issues and shoddy services https://t.co/6XLSdVzdvm

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 魁北克省在发布了预计赤字将大幅增加的预算后，正计划从其雨天基金中提取数十亿美元，以减少借贷需求
item.description:
Quebec is planning to take billions of dollars from its rainy-day funds to reduce borrowing needs after it released a budget that anticipate much larger deficits https://t.co/tZV9tpVEbJ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 美国国债下跌，原因是交易商对美联储今年宽松货币政策的步伐和范围的预期押注不断下调
item.description:
US Treasuries declined as traders increasingly dialed back bets on the pace and scope of monetary easing expected from the Federal Reserve this year https://t.co/vLR3ZVJjgG

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员 Gabriel Makhlouf 表示，欧洲中央银行应能在 6 月份就利率问题做出决定，并告诫不要仓促做出决定
item.description:
The European Central Bank should be able to make a decision on interest rates in June, according to Governing Council member Gabriel Makhlouf, cautioning against hasty decisions https://t.co/1bze0juQTR

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 哥伦比亚中央银行董事会成员表示，哥伦比亚通胀放缓、经济疲软，因此需要更积极地降低利率
item.description:
Colombia’s slowing inflation and weak economy call for more aggressive interest rate cuts, according to a member of the central bank’s board https://t.co/9QjIDqIUSL

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 联邦调查局对马阿拉歌的突袭引起了特朗普的激烈反应。FOIA 记录显示，这也激怒了联邦调查局的一些员工，其中一名员工称联邦调查局为 "香蕉共和国"。
item.description:
The FBI's raid of Mar-a-Lago drew fierce reaction from Trump. But it also roiled some of the bureau's rank and file, FOIA records show, with one employee calling the agency a "Banana Republic" https://t.co/NggXAoIYbq

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 股市正受到一个通常沉睡的角落的推动，这个角落突然变得生机勃勃。
item.description:
The stock market is getting a push from a usually sleepy corner that’s suddenly come to life. https://t.co/xd0HKwh61k

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 苹果公司已与一批投资者达成 4.9 亿美元的和解协议，这些投资者指控首席执行官蒂姆-库克在 2018 年就公司的销售前景发表了虚假和误导性言论
item.description:
Apple has reached a $490 million settlement with a group of investors who had accused Chief Executive Officer Tim Cook of making false and misleading statements in 2018 about the company’s sales prospects https://t.co/Nx59gFNB9C

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 全美房地产经纪人协会同意就美国房地产经纪人佣金规则的诉讼达成和解，为广泛改变美国人买卖房屋的方式扫清了道路。
item.description:
The National Association of Realtors agreed to settle litigation over commission rules for US real estate agents, clearing the way for widespread changes in how Americans buy and sell homes. https://t.co/hN5PhHqnFq

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 在贸易紧张局势挥之不去的情况下，法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙计划于春季在巴黎接待中国总统习近平
item.description:
French President Emmanuel Macron plans to host Chinese counterpart Xi Jinping in Paris in the spring amid lingering trade tensions https://t.co/ovVFXqPyn5

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: Binance 收紧了对新数字代币上市的要求，称这一变化是为了在其平台上加强对投资者的保护
item.description:
Binance has tightened requirements for listing new digital tokens, saying the changes are an attempt to bolster investor protections on its platform https://t.co/VAcJxgSZK5

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 它本应是 2024 年银行和基金经理的热门信贷交易。现在，美国的规则制定者正在给它泼冷水。
item.description:
It was supposed to be 2024’s hot credit trade for banks and money managers. Now US rulemakers are pouring cold water on it. https://t.co/dg5xsmjNN5

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 巴西总统卢拉有望任命前财政部长吉多-曼特加（Guido Mantega）为巴西橡胶公司（Braskem）董事会成员，因为政府将对公司决策施加更多影响。
item.description:
Brazil President Lula is expected to appoint former Finance Minister Guido Mantega to the board of Braskem as the government pushes for more influence in companies’ decisions https://t.co/DtuOQKMrFk

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 安哥拉央行将关键利率上调至15个月来最高水平，以抑制通胀
item.description:
Angola’s central bank raises its key interest rate to the highest level in 15 months to rein in inflation https://t.co/4SdO66XQwZ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 就在美国收购公司埃利奥特投资管理公司（Elliott Investment Management）放弃收购英国电子产品零售商 Currys 几天后，中国零售商表示不会收购该公司。
item.description:
Chinese retailer https://t.co/5NY8mE5jTb says it will not make an offer for British electronics retailer Currys, just days after US buyout firm Elliott Investment Management also walked away https://t.co/hCioniV60g

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 再通胀忧虑升温，4% 的美联储基金利率悄然进入华尔街的视野
item.description:
A 4% Fed funds rate creeps into Wall Street's buzz as reflation worries rise https://t.co/eqDcXOjyGq

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 3 月初，美国消费者情绪基本保持稳定，因为美国人在总统大选前对前景的看法变得更加谨慎。
item.description:
US consumer sentiment mostly held steady in early March as Americans grew somewhat more cautious about the outlook ahead of the presidential election. https://t.co/XKRw9yWwp8

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 巴拿马运河避免了一场可能颠覆全球经济的最严重的航运危机，但海洋生物和拉美国家的饮用水供应却为此付出了代价。
item.description:
The Panama Canal has avoided the worst of a shipping crunch that threatened to upend the global economy — but at a cost to marine life and the Latin American country’s supplies of potable water. https://t.co/fpnM1arjrc

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 欧元区的职位空缺在去年年底继续下降，2023 年第四季度达到 2.7%，创下两年多来的新低。
item.description:
Job vacancies in the euro area continued to drop at the end of last year, touching a more than two-year low of 2.7% in the fourth quarter of 2023 https://t.co/mEQK4PYoN1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 欧洲央行管理委员会成员鲍里斯-武伊契奇（Boris Vujcic）表示，欧元区经济的大幅下滑可能会加快欧洲央行降低借贷成本的速度，但这一进程何时开始并不重要。
item.description:
A major stumble in the euro-zone economy could increase the speed at which the ECB lowers borrowing costs, though not when the process begins, according to Governing Council member Boris Vujcic https://t.co/g5dbsrIjRQ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 乌克兰立法者计划审议一项允许监狱囚犯参战的法案，因为国家正在想方设法增加前线的人手
item.description:
Ukrainian lawmakers plan to consider a bill that would allow prison inmates to join the war effort as the nation seeks ways to bolster manpower on the front lines https://t.co/zFS6DbbDJ9

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 欧盟将把与埃及的关系升级为 "战略伙伴关系"，此举可能为这个北非国家带来数十亿欧元的资金和投资
item.description:
The EU is set to upgrade its relationship with Egypt to the status of a “strategic partnership,” a move that could trigger billions of euros of funding and investments for the North African country https://t.co/tLNN7fuIvJ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024

item.title: 美国 2 月份工业生产几乎没有增长，原因是温和的天气抑制了公用事业需求，但刺激了工厂产出的回升
item.description:
US industrial production barely rose in February as milder weather damped utility demand but spurred a snapback in factory output https://t.co/1VtAcCZ8YZ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 15, 2024
